body: Thank you very much, Theodore, for the detailed advice! I followed your suggestions from step 1 to 3. As to step 4b, i got the following error when running ****decomposePar****: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypWvEcC5NN6VCXoa*2shym*4lO9hJEEXgxE3wjV4PLSP2MCSf*i*Zidz0212Np*huU-SCD9B8LjUGgRvHKEcRowG/Image7.png) So, I run the simulation not in parallel: ****simpleFoam****, and the the it converges after 1769 iterations: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypU9716ADRiV9ehUISSJGZiM-0xlrPbTA26MvWO3WuQcGXvJO4bP3BV0ZBXOVGfBJwUjdnT7a7Oj6-SLdA67Zl13/Image8.png) Several new folders were created in the case folder: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypXtnsZh9Bm14r31-THjQHdRt5HjHYx3z5oQ9I4bInzZTtjCMlXMZdS3IPNj5WpazBAa8INeNLuqz73FppSwd8kM/Image9.png) I opened the case file in PareView, which gives the following error message: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypXRHOysWqw7BUJoNqlJllLkk5obDIiV9EY0MyqJYz*fny1WkNuHbNSuegQLkx3FYqoPIfmwOTs*VYfj4yyDaeew/Image1.png) Nevertheless, the results can still be visualized, but I'm not sure if the visualization is correct:[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypUGJRDjNVH4rQwTtAAM1I6b9QE9RuAyK1axpVwJBVXgdg1c3nGrvX*-evyj6JwbWvBwe9JIJC7i-Ku1n4nhA4m6/Image2.png)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypUH---oUpsHppwFjQuUaD6dJZuaJHfozWS3-VXOqu8i8EQ88q7GxPkZzbnFhobRR9kBlsoXI2ro92ggDR7Bg4mY/Image4.png) ... and additional error messages keep coming out: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypWdqKO3jDz-WtVBrZjK6NJtzA3k4bZQoS-PvVfhnac8MDYLQ5te4zBAq6wFPHKuuK-ybj1YbopZp3JMTA5yNeHC/Image6.png) Hope you can kindly advise if the results are correct and what to do with the error message during visualization in ParaView. Thank you very much!
